text: hello all - I have a simple question - is it possible to pass a HubSpot form’s input values to a URL from within the same form on the submit button?

e.g. let’s say the form had an email field and the user input was <mailto:myemail@acme.com|myemail@acme.com>.  is it possible to hyperlink the submit button action to ‘<http://mylink.com/ref?=myemail@acme.com|mylink.com/ref?=myemail@acme.com>’
<@U3CKY9VPY> with Javascript or jQuery possibly, have you tried this?
not at the moment, but you can try and use onchange for the input value and add that to the end of your href attr text
Lmk if you got it to work, otherwise I can check into it but I believe you should be able to do with js ref <http://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>
thanks, <@U23602KDF> i’ll test and let you know.
